directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Spread pie filling over the bottom of the prepared pan, then sprinkle evenly with the cake mix.  Pour lemon-lime soda over the top.  Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
title: Easy Fruit Cobbler Cake
